title: GAME INVENTORY SOUNDS: PACK1
description: This audio asset pack contains everyday foley sounds of various plastic, metallic, and wooden items.
longDescription:
AUDIO DEMO


''GAME INVENTORY SOUNDS: PACK1'' contains the following foley sound effects that are useful in everyday tasks.

Each sound type has multiple variations. We created all the sounds originally at 96kHz/24bit.

The sounds are organized into three audio specs as mentioned in the technical details.


Sound types:-


  1. Rummaging Various Items
  2. Clicky Gears
  3. Clicky Metal
  4. Electric Switch Button Press
  5. Fan Regulator Turning Rotating Geary
  6. Kitchen Gas Lighter Igniter Cooking
  7. Metal Object Rasping Scratchy Rubbing Back and Forth
  8. Plastic Impact 1
  9. Plastic Clicky Type2
  10. Plastic Clicky Sound Type3
  11. Plastic Pressing Clicky
  12. Plastic Spring Bouncy Clicky
  13. Plastic Toy Wheels
  14. Plastic Toy Type2 Wheels
  15. Rattling Plastic Item
  16. Rubbing Scrubbing on Plastic Item
  17. Scissors Cutter Slicing Cutting
  18. Skateboard Wheels Oneshot
  19. Small Metal Object Hit
  20. Small Plastic Object Contact
  21. Spray Perfume Deodorant Paint Gas Leak
  22. Wooden Object Strike
  23. Wooden Tongs
  24. Wood Knocking
technicalDetails:
TOTAL UNIQUE SOUNDS: 192


Number of Audio Waves: 192 + 192 + 192

Number of Audio Cues: 192 + 192 + 192

Sample rate / bit rate: 96kHz-24bit + 48kHz-24bit + 44.1kHz-24bit

Audio file types: Wav

Do Sound FX loop: No

Additional: Stereo 

Minutes of audio provided: 3:17

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes
